title: ProIdiots
author: ProIdiots
content: They say you can never be too prepared.I need a few experienced people who have been in the space for years to review our new site, make recommendations, and ask the questions as if you were going to be putting in your own money so we can be better prepared.We want to ensure we have everything covered that gives a clear understanding to non-crypto people of our project.The last thing we want to do is lose them or confuse them.Spend 1 hour helping us, and we will pay you $100 in BTC through Escrow.We will pay the same day, and depending on your merit and position; we would be open to paying in advance for each hour.The only requirement is we require 100% discretion.  We ask that you don't talk about our project to anyone at this time.Thank you in advance.

And I don't easily trust people/companies who make such claims.

comments.body: Quote from: ProIdiots on June 16, 2022, 06:16:35 AMI need a few experienced people who have been in the space for years to review our new site, make recommendations, and ask the questions as if you were going to be putting in your own money so we can be better prepared.Can you clarify the extent of the experience of these people, for example, there are people who have spent several years here, but they specialize, for example, in technical analysis, price forecasting, mining, technical discussions, legal aspects ... etc.Unless you specify the nature of your project, what evaluations you are looking for, or the specialists, your search will be very random.Is there a certain rank, a certain number of merits?Quote from: ProIdiots on June 16, 2022, 06:16:35 AMSpend 1 hour helping us, and we will pay you $100 in BTC through Escrow.If you put money into escrow first, you'll get more attention.

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: Quote from: ProIdiots on June 16, 2022, 01:03:15 PMWhere do you set up escrow?If you accept to pay first for a trusted member who is ready to review your site, then you are good to go without the need to contact an escrow.Otherwise, you can use one from this list: Recommended bitcointalk escrow servicesNote that you will have to pay extra fee for the escrow service provider.

comments.author: coolcoinz
comments.body: There's also a way to do it without an escrow, but it requires you to pay for the first hour up front. A forum account is worth more than $100 so a hero or legendary member won't risk getting accused of scamming anyone for such a small amount of money. Let us know more about the job and what skills are required. I know how to write a review, if that's what you want.
